opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Orders affirmed.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
540 A.2d 266
Michael STEINER, a minor, by Anna STEINER, his Guardian, and Douglas Steiner, a minor, by Anna Steiner, his Guardian, Appellants, v. The BELL TELEPHONE COMPANY OF PENNSYLVANIA. Ronald L. KEIRS and Carissa Lynn Keirs, a minor, by Ronald L. Keirs, her natural parent and guardian v. Robert W. WELSH, a/k/a Robert William Welsh, t/d/b/a Bob’s Bar, and Michael Dire. Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 12, 1988.
Decided April 26, 1988.
